name: Burrito Real
description: Large tortilla wrapped around seasoned ground beef or chicken, topped with lettuce, tomatoes, sour cream and cheese, served with Mexican rice and beans

name: Deluxe
description: Two tortillas stuffed with beans and shredded chicken, topped with cheese, lettuce, tomato, our special sauce, and sour cream

name: Fajita Burrito
description: A flour burrito stuffed with strips of steak or marinated chicken, then covered with melted cheese, served with rice or beans, vegetables and guacamole

name: Mexicano Burrito
description: A tortilla filled with pork, tomato, onion and bell peppers, topped with our cheese sauce, lettuce, tomato and guacamole

name: Guadalajara
description: One burrito and enchilada, topped with lettuce, sour cream, and pico de gallo

name: Cancun
description: Grilled specially seasoned chicken, roasted peppers and onions, topped with our cheese sauce and crushed pineapple, served with guacamole salad and Mexican rice

name: California
description: Stuffed with grilled chicken or beef, rice, beans, lettuce, sour cream and pico de gallo, topped with green salsa, melted cheese and quacamole
